casebody.data:
Francisco K. AVOKI and Ekoko K. Avoki
v.
Larry Eugene FEREBEE, Jr., Does I-XX (Unknown), and Intervener Government Employees Insurance Company. No. 284P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Francisco K. Avoki, for Avoki, Francisco K., et al. Ekoko K. Avoki. C. Rob Wilson, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Ferebee, Larry Eugene (Jr.), et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiffs on the 10th of August 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused
